comment: : A city in Louisiana has made "twerking" illegal, imposing a punishment of days in jail for a first offense
amr:
# ::snt : A city in Louisiana has made "twerking" illegal, imposing a punishment of days in jail for a first offense
(m / make-02
      :ARG0 (c / city
            :location (s / state
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Louisiana")))
      :ARG1 (l / legal-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (t / twerking))
      :manner (ii / impose-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (p / punish-01
                  :ARG1 c
                  :ARG2 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (d / day)
                        :location (j / jail))
                  :ARG3 (o / offend-03
                        :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity
                              :value 1)))))
